Uses of Interface
com.noctarius.tengi.core.connection.Connection

  • Packages that use Connection 
    Package Description
    com.noctarius.tengi.client
    The client package contains classes necessary to create a client instance inside applications.
    com.noctarius.tengi.core.connection
    The connection package contains the common interfaces to work with server or client connections.
    com.noctarius.tengi.core.listener
    The listener package contains the common listener interfaces for messages (MessageListener) and any kind of connection events (ConnectionListener as well as broken down interfaces for Java 8 support.
    com.noctarius.tengi.spi.connection
    The connection package contains interfaces and base-classes necessary to implement custom transports using the provided SPI.

    • Uses of Connection in com.noctarius.tengi.client

      Methods in com.noctarius.tengi.client that return types with arguments of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default CompletableFuture<Connection> Client.connect(InetAddress address)
      Connects the client to the given address and using Transports configured in the Configuration instance passed to Client.create(com.noctarius.tengi.core.config.Configuration) method when creating the client.
      CompletableFuture<Connection> Client.connect(InetAddress address, ConnectedListener connectedListener)
      Connects the client to the given address and using Transports configured in the Configuration instance passed to Client.create(com.noctarius.tengi.core.config.Configuration) method when creating the client.
      default CompletableFuture<Connection> Client.connect(String host)
      Connects the client to the given host and using Transports configured in the Configuration instance passed to Client.create(com.noctarius.tengi.core.config.Configuration) method when creating the client.
      CompletableFuture<Connection> Client.connect(String host, ConnectedListener connectedListener)
      Connects the client to the given host and using Transports configured in the Configuration instance passed to Client.create(com.noctarius.tengi.core.config.Configuration) method when creating the client.

    • Uses of Connection in com.noctarius.tengi.core.connection

      Methods in com.noctarius.tengi.core.connection that return types with arguments of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<Connection> Connection.disconnect()
      Disconnects the connection and releases any internally acquired resources that are assigned to this connection.

    • Uses of Connection in com.noctarius.tengi.core.listener

      Methods in com.noctarius.tengi.core.listener with parameters of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConnectedListener.onConnection(Connection connection)
      This method is called whenever a connection has connected to setup any kind of additional application state necessary or allocate additional resources.
      void DisconnectedListener.onDisconnect(Connection connection)
      This method is called whenever a connection was disconnected to clean up application state, free internal resources or similar actions.
      void ExceptionListener.onExceptionally(Connection connection, Throwable throwable)
      This method is called whenever an operations, that is assigned to known connection, has thrown an exception.
      void MessageListener.onMessage(Connection connection, Message message)
      This method is called whenever a new message arrives on one of the transports.

    • Uses of Connection in com.noctarius.tengi.spi.connection

      Classes in com.noctarius.tengi.spi.connection that implement Connection 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractConnection
      The AbstractConnection acts as a base class for server- and client-side Connection implementations.
      Methods in com.noctarius.tengi.spi.connection that return types with arguments of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract CompletableFuture<Connection> ConnectionContext.close(Connection connection)
      Closes the ConnectionContext itself and must free all internal resources.
      CompletableFuture<Connection> AbstractConnection.disconnect() 
      abstract CompletableFuture<Connection> ConnectionContext.writeSocket(S socket, Connection connection, MemoryBuffer memoryBuffer)
      Writes the given MemoryBuffer to the given socket.
      Methods in com.noctarius.tengi.spi.connection with parameters of type Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract CompletableFuture<Connection> ConnectionContext.close(Connection connection)
      Closes the ConnectionContext itself and must free all internal resources.
      void AbstractConnection.onConnection(Connection connection) 
      void AbstractConnection.onDisconnect(Connection connection) 
      void AbstractConnection.onExceptionally(Connection connection, Throwable throwable) 
      void ConnectionContext.processPollingRequest(S socket, Connection connection, PollingRequest request)
      This method is called when a non-streaming Transport receives a long-polling or polling request for all cached elements since the last retrieval.
      abstract CompletableFuture<Connection> ConnectionContext.writeSocket(S socket, Connection connection, MemoryBuffer memoryBuffer)
      Writes the given MemoryBuffer to the given socket.
